• Four in a team.

 • You get to defend or oppose the statement based on the flip of a coin.

 • A coin is tossed and the winning team will choose the topic and decide whether to oppose or defend it.

 • Two minutes for preparation is given. Each team will have 4 minutes to present their position.

 • Each team will have 4 minutes again to rebut the argument of the other team. 

 • Repetition of the same point leads to disqualification. 

 • No quarrelling is allowed.

 • Each team will have three minutes to conclude their position. No new information can be introduced during the conclusion.
